methods.Synopsis: Find the popularity of a phrase over a series of time blocks.

parameters.Name: phrase
parameters.Description: The word or phrase to search for.

parameters.Name: bioguide_id
parameters.Description: The Bioguide ID of a member of congress, past or present, to limit results to.

parameters.Name: mincount
parameters.Description: A numeric minimum of mentions per returned time block.

parameters.Name: percentages
parameters.Description: Return the percent of this count to the total words spoken in the result object.

parameters.Name: granularity
parameters.Description: The size of each block in the time series.

parameters.Name: state
parameters.Description: The 2-letter postal code for a state to limit results to.

parameters.Name: party
parameters.Description: A political party to limit results to.

parameters.Name: chamber
parameters.Description: The section of the congressional record to limit results to.

parameters.Name: date
parameters.Description: A single date to limit results to, YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.Name: start_date
parameters.Description: The start bound of a date range to limit results to, YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: The end bound of a date range to limit results to, YYYY-MM-DD format.

methods.Synopsis: List the top phrases for a specific entity/facet.

parameters.Name: entity_type
parameters.Description: The type of the entity to facet on.

parameters.Name: entity_value
parameters.Description: The value of the :entity_type to facet on

parameters.Name: n
parameters.Description: The length of phrase, in words, 1 to 5.

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: The page of results to show, zero-indexed.

parameters.Name: sort
parameters.Description: The metric to sort by. A direction must also be supplied, eg. 'tfidf asc'

methods.Synopsis: List the top entities in a facet for a specific phrase.

parameters.Name: entity
parameters.Description: The type of facet to list entities for.

parameters.Name: phrase
parameters.Description: The word or phrase to list entities for.

parameters.Name: mincount
parameters.Description: A numeric minimum of mentions per returned time block.

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: The page of results to show, zero-indexed.

parameters.Name: per_page
parameters.Description: The number of results to return per page. The maximum is 50.

parameters.Name: sort
parameters.Description: The metric on which to sort top results. Facet sorting in Solr is either lexicographical ascending, or by count descending. The only valid values here are 'count' or :entity

parameters.Name: state
parameters.Description: The 2-letter postal code for a state to limit results to.

parameters.Name: party
parameters.Description: A political party to limit results to.

parameters.Name: chamber
parameters.Description: The section of the congressional record to limit results to.

parameters.Name: date
parameters.Description: A single date to limit results to, YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.Name: start_date
parameters.Description: The start bound of a date range to limit results to, YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: The end bound of a date range to limit results to, YYYY-MM-DD format.

methods.Synopsis: Full-text search over the entire Congressional Record back to 1996.

parameters.Name: phrase
parameters.Description: A word or phrase to search the body of each CR document for. Required if Title is not supplied.

parameters.Name: title
parameters.Description: A word or phrase to search the title of each CR document for. Required if Phrase is not supplied.

parameters.Name: bioguide_id
parameters.Description: Limit results to the member of Congress with the given Bioguide ID, eg. L000551.

parameters.Name: cr_pages
parameters.Description: The page numbers in the Congressional Record to search.

parameters.Name: page
parameters.Description: The page of results to show, zero-indexed.

parameters.Name: state
parameters.Description: The 2-letter postal code for a state to limit results to.

parameters.Name: party
parameters.Description: A political party to limit results to.

parameters.Name: chamber
parameters.Description: The section of the congressional record to limit results to.

parameters.Name: date
parameters.Description: A single date to limit results to, YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.Name: start_date
parameters.Description: The start bound of a date range to limit results to, YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.Name: end_date
parameters.Description: The end bound of a date range to limit results to, YYYY-MM-DD format.
